items.sentence: Tom put an engagement ring on Mary\'s finger.
Tom said he didn\'t want to sit next to Mary.
Tom said he doesn\'t want to do that anymore.
I thought Tom would leave the book with Mary.
I thought that you said Tom was in Australia.
I told Tom I thought that it was a good idea.
Tom has never been seriously ill in his life.
Tom has never done anything like this before.
Tom has never won anything in his whole life.
Tom has no alibi for the night of the murder.
Tom has offered to take care of the children.
Tom has over three million dollars in assets.
Tom\'s parents weren\'t particularly pleased.
I\'ve done everything that needed to be done.
I do not and never will feed my dog raw fish.
It\'s obvious Tom doesn\'t like Mary anymore.
Can you at least pretend you want to be here?
Are you sure you don\'t want a cup of coffee?
Are you sure you don\'t want anything to eat?
Mary represented her team in the competition.
